content:
Hello, http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/StructureDefinition-C4BB-ExplanationOfBenefit-Pharmacy.xml doesn't produce the raw xml but rather produces the snapshot table.
image.png

I think you mean raw xml as opposed to raw json. What you see in the browser is a rendered version of the narrative text. In your browser, if you view page source, you should see the xml. You can also right click on the link and download as an xml file.
Thanks for pointing out! Changed json to xml in the post. I understand that there are options to get the raw xml but just pointing this out so that the CARIN team sees this and can fix it.

Thanks for pointing it out. I think this may be a general concern to post in the IG creation stream as this seems to be the way that all somewhat recently built IGs work. I think it may be an artifact of the way the publisher creates the structure definition and how browsers display it.
For example, plan-net: view-source:https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition-plannet-HealthcareService.xml
